title: Tikki Tikki Tembo
creator_credit: Morton Schindel, Weston Woods Studios and Gary Templeton
brief_description: In this charming old Chinese fairy tale, we learn why Chinese parents today give their children little short names instead of great long names. This fable with a moral will delight viewers young and old.
creator_credit_for_label: Morton Schindel, Weston Woods Studios and Gary Templeton
description: In this charming old Chinese fairy tale, we learn why Chinese parents today give their children little short names instead of great long names. This fable with a moral will delight viewers young and old.
